title: What we made
text: Caitlin made pasta that included blue cheese and quick-pickled raisins seasoned with allspice. To finish it, she added raw red onions and soft-boiled eggs. The dish was paired with oven-roasted brussel sprouts coated in maple syrup and smoked paprika sauce. For drinks, I mixed home-made kvas with sparkling water with lime juice.

title: What we made
text:
October 14th, 2025
We made fried rice. Typical: carrots, onions, garlic, garlic chives, green onions, and eggs. Seasoned generously with soy sauce and MSG. Served with leftover green beans.

title: What we made
text:
October 13th, 2025
I made kimchi stew with canned tuna. Paired with frozen green bean, I did a tamarind based sauce. A bit of a play on pad thai with a generous amount of peanuts and garlic chives. Then I made oatbread which I paired with the new Trader Joeâ€™s Mimolette and apple. I was feeling more bread and apple for dinner. Caitlin ate bread, kimchi stew and rice, and cheese in the same bowl.
